content.introduction:
Finds usages of C-style casts.

C-style casts can perform a variety of different conversions (
const_cast
,

static_cast
, 
reinterpret_cast
, or a combination). This makes them
dangerous as the intent is not clear, and they can silently perform unsafe
conversions between incompatible types.

This check is similar to 
-Wold-style-cast
, but it suggests automated fixes
in some cases. The reported locations should not be different from the ones
generated by 
-Wold-style-cast
.
